text: Psalm 33
Praise to Yahweh for His Character and Creation
Exult in Yahweh, O \add you\add* righteous,
\add for\add* praise \add is\add* fitting for the upright.
Give thanks to Yahweh with \add the\add* lyre;
with a harp of ten strings play to him.
Sing to him a new song;
play skillfully with jubilant shout.
For the word of Yahweh \add is\add* upright,
and all his work \add is done\add* in faithfulness.
\add He\add* loves righteousness and justice.
The earth is full of the loyal love of Yahweh.
By the word of Yahweh \add the\add* heavens were made,
and by the breath of his mouth all their host.
\add He\add* gathered the waters of the sea like a heap.
\add He\add* put \add the\add* deeps in storehouses.
Let all the earth fear Yahweh.
Let all \add the\add* inhabitants of \add the\add* world stand in awe of him.
For ⸤he himself spoke⸥\f + \fr 33:9 \ft Literally “he, he spoke” \f* and it came to pass.
⸤He himself commanded⸥\f + \fr 33:9 \ft Literally “He, he commanded” \f* and it stood firm.
Yahweh brings to nothing\f + \fr 33:10 \ft Or “breaks” \f* \add the\add* plan of nations;
he frustrates\f + \fr 33:10 \ft Or “nullifies” \f* \add the\add* intents of peoples.
The plan of Yahweh stands firm forever,
the intents of his heart ⸤from one generation to the next⸥.\f + \fr 33:11 \ft Literally “to a generation and a generation” \f*
Blessed \add is\add* the nation whose God \add is\add* Yahweh,
the people he has chosen for his inheritance.
From heaven Yahweh looks;
he sees all the children of humankind.
From his dwelling place\f + \fr 33:14 \ft Or “the place where he sits enthroned” \f* he gazes
on all the inhabitants of the earth,
he who fashions altogether their heart,
he who understands all their works.
The king \add is\add* not saved by \add the\add* greatness of an army.
The warrior is not delivered by \add the\add* greatness of strength.
The horse \add is\add* a false hope for victory,
nor can it save by the greatness of its power.
Behold, the eye of Yahweh \add is\add* on those who fear him,
on those who hope\f + \fr 33:18 \ft Or “wait expectantly” \f* for his loyal love
to deliver their soul from death
and to keep them alive in famine.
Our soul waits for Yahweh;
he \add is\add* our help and our shield.
For in him our heart rejoices
because in his holy name we trust.
Let your loyal love, O Yahweh, be upon us,
⸤even as⸥\f + \fr 33:22 \ft Literally “as which” \f* we hope in you.
